basics.name: Keyu He
basics.label: Undergraduate Researcher
basics.summary: Undergraduate double major in Computer Science and Applied & Computational Mathematics with a minor in Artificial Intelligence Applications. Passionate about explainable NLP systems, interpretable machine learning, and cross-disciplinary AI research.

education.area: Computer Science and Applied & Computational Mathematics
education.summary: Minor in Artificial Intelligence Applications. Deanâ€™s List every semester and member of Phi Kappa Phi Honor Society.
courses: Language Models in Natural Language Processing

work.name: USC Viterbi School of Engineering
work.summary: Contributed to research on explainable NLP systems and visual language models, focusing on audience-specific explanations and trustworthiness.

projects.name: LLM Prompt Recovery
projects.summary: Developed a system to recover user prompts using fine-tuned Mixtral models. Ranked top 3.4% in a Kaggle competition.
highlights: Achieved a score of 0.65 using sentence-T5-base.

projects.name: Automated Hate Speech Detection
projects.summary: Developed an advanced machine learning model for detecting hate speech on social media with 94% accuracy.

awards.title: Silver Medal, Kaggle Competition
awards.summary: Ranked 75/2175 in the LLM Prompt Recovery project.

awards.title: 1st Prize, International Linguistics Olympiad
awards.summary: Individual and Team Open Round, Senior Level, China.
